autoAcceptTpa.name: Auto-Accept TPA
autoAcceptTpa.description: If enabled, all /tpa requests will be accepted automatically.

autoAcceptTpaHere.name: Auto-Accept TPA-Here
autoAcceptTpaHere.description: If enabled, all /tpahere requests will be accepted automatically.

showOriginalMessage.name: Show Original Message
showOriginalMessage.description: If enabled, the original TPA request message from the server will be displayed in chat.

showPlayerName.name: Show Player Name
showPlayerName.description: Displays the player's name in the custom clickable message when auto-accept is disabled. This should be turned off for compatibility with other addons (e.g. CustomNameTags).

playSound.name: Play Sound
playSound.description: Settings for sound notifications on incoming TPA requests.
